content.raw:
> if the joint position is set to a value not on the axis of the joint

I'm afraid I'm having some trouble parsing this phrase, so let me check if I'm understanding correctly: Do you mean "if the `<pose>` element within a `<joint>` element of an SDF has a translation whose cross-product with the joint axis is non-zero"?
